title: Pro.Cycling.Manager.2008-RELOADED - CRACK ONLY
description:
Pro.Cycling.Manager.2008-RELOADED - CRACK ONLY !!!



Finally waiting is over, enjoy mates :)


Pro Cycling Manager 2008 (c) Cyanide

06/2008: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Starforce
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Sports

You&#039;ll play as the general manager of one of 65 official cycling teams and
will handle all aspects of a professional team&#039;s season. Numerous duties
including team recruiting, transfers, contracts, training and handling
finances are required for you to create and manage the most competitive
team. Throughout the 180 real-time 3D playable races, it&#039;s up to you to
determine and put into action the best strategies by combining tactics
attacks, relays and much more. With so many options to consider that will
affect the outcome of the race, you are guaranteed action packed intense
stages

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4. Copy the cracked content over from the Crack directory on the disc to
your installation directory
5. Play the game




btw hope to see you for online race :)
